# Dash Documentation â€” Dash latest documentation

> The Dash Documentation offers information and guides on Dash, the open source peer-to-peer cryptocurrency with a strong focus on the payments industry.

## Documentation Types

- [Dash User Docs](https://docs.dash.org/docs/user/index.html)
- [Dash Core Docs](https://docs.dash.org/docs/core/index.html)
- [Dash Platform Docs](https://docs.dash.org/projects/platform/en/stable/docs/index.html)
